title: Los Angeles County MEHKO
description: LA County MEHKO (excludes Pasadena, Long Beach, Vernon). Up to 30 meals/day, 90/week, $100k cap.

steps.title: Plan Your MEHKO
steps.content: Review ‘How to Get Started’ + Self‑Inspection Checklist. Ensure kitchen/menu align with MEHKO rules.

steps.title: Approvals & Training
steps.content: Landlord OK (if renting). Get Certified Food Protection Manager. Check city business license. Register sales tax. Check ABC if serving alcohol.

steps.title: Prepare Required Documents
steps.content: SOP + menu, Public Health Permit Application, CFPM certificate, Food Handler Cards, water test (if on private well).

steps.title: Health Permit Application
steps.content: Complete and submit the official Public Health Permit Application.

steps.title: Submit Application & Fees
steps.content: Submit online. Pay $597 review fee (unless subsidized).

steps.title: Schedule & Pass Inspection
steps.content: Dept. schedules inspection. Fix issues and do follow‑ups if needed.

steps.title: Operate & Stay Compliant
steps.content: Follow approved SOP. Notify program of changes within 20 days. Observe $100k/year and 30/day, 90/week limits.

steps.title: Limited‑Time Subsidy
steps.content: Fee waiver for first 1,000 applicants (net revenue < $50k, no prior subsidy). Deadline: June 30, 2026 or until funds run out.
